about_the_game:
Nuclear Bundle for Idle Wasteland
Contains:
Radiated Suits - Trims everyone of yours suits and gives +50 Max Damage, +50 Armor Penetration, +10% Crit Chance, +10 Resistance
Nuclear Anvil - +5 Max Craft Multiplier, +10% Instant Craft Chance
Lightning Boosts - +50% Run Speed (This is way more powerful than it sounds), -25% Stun Duration
Bonus: 525 Nuclear Material, 6 Super Skill Points
